name: OHOY! - A Text-Based Prototype
description:
OHOY! is a game where you play as a swashbuckling pirate captain searching for a grand treasure, hidden somewhere in the great ASCII-sea. 

  • Captain your sloop and explore the sea in search of the island that holds the riches of your dreams!
  • Engage in deadly combat with the creatures guarding the islands! Utilize different weapons to eliminate your foes!
  • Store clues in your journal and use them to deduce the true location of the treasure island!

OHOY! was made by Patrik & Anton Harrysson

Special thanks to our wonderful producer, Matej "Retro" Jan!
